channel.title: event on Yoichi Kawasaki
channel.description: Recent content in event on Yoichi Kawasaki

item.title: My presentation at IstioCon 2022
item.description: I presented on Apri 28th (April 29th JST): “Accelerating ZOZOTOWN Modernization with Istio” at IstioCon 2022. It was an awesome experience for me to present for the global technology conference like IsitoCon. ⛵️Istio is a synonym of acceleration & modernization. Register for #IstioCon to learn about "Accelerating ZOZOTOWN Modernization process with #Istio" by @yokawasa 🤓👉 https://t.co/SWyXAsfqcO #Istio #CloudNative #ServiceMesh pic.twitter.com/BNyeLsAVHI — Istio (@IstioMesh) April 25, 2022 You can find the slides for my presentation: https://speakerdeck.

item.title: GitHub Actions Article on Software Design 2022/02 Issue was released!
item.description: A Software Design 2022/02 Issue was published in Jan 18, 2022!! I contributed the 2nd special feature article on CI/CD using GitHub Actions in it 🎉🎉🎉 Please get it at an online bookstore!! 『Software Design 2022年2月号』（技術評論社）/ Software Design 2022/02 Issue (gihyo) Gihyo Online Amazon

item.title: College Roommate
item.description: A scene at wedding ceremony of my old collage roommate Jan 18, 2020 at Brooklyn NY

item.title: Visual Studio Code Textbook for programmer was published!
item.description: A book, I co-authored with @hoisjp and @_Dr_ASA, was recently published. Today I went to a bookstore to see if it was actually displayed. It was real!! 🎉🎉🎉 『プログラマーのためのVisual Studio Codeの教科書』（マイナビ出版）/ Visual Studio Code textbooks for programmers Softcover version Kindle version
